title: The Celestial Gardener Bot
prompt: (masterpiece), best quality, highly detailed, intricate illustration in Fantasy Xianxia style, a graceful humanoid robot clad in elaborate teal and gold traditional Chinese robes, standing inside a luxurious, sunlit botanical studio. The robot is carefully watering exotic fantasy houseplants using a crystal pitcher emitting glowing blue, ethereal water. The studio features curved wooden window frames, ancient pagoda architecture details, and high-tech holographic displays showing plant data. Through the large arched window, floating celestial islands with waterfalls and lush greenery are visible in the 16:9 background. Detailed textures, volumetric golden lighting, rich color palette, cinematic focus.
negativePrompt: lowres, worst quality, poor detail, low detail, deformed, noisy, blurry, watermark, signature, text, extra limbs, bad anatomy, grayscale, monochrome, dull colors, mutation
